Package store.api

Class MovieInfoApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • store.api.MovieInfoApi
  • public class MovieInfoApi
extends java.lang.Object
    Api to connect to an online scraper of rotten tomatoes and IMDB. Written by myslef, using only the php library Simple HTML Dom: http://simplehtmldom.sourceforge.net/
    Author:
    anton

      • rtQuery

        public store.api.RtQueryDTO rtQuery​(java.lang.String query)
                             throws exception.APIRequestException
        Uses RottenTomatoes Search api to look for a certain query
        Parameters:
        query - : The string to look for on rotten tomatoes
        Returns:
        a RtQueryDTO containing movies and series found for that query
        Throws:
        exception.APIRequestException - When the API Request couldn't be fullfilled

      • rtInfo

        public store.api.RtMovieDTO rtInfo​(java.lang.String rtPath)
                            throws exception.APIRequestException
        Scrapes RT at path and returns info about that movie
        Parameters:
        rtPath - : The path on rotten tomatoes to scrape
        Returns:
        a RtMovieDTO object containing that movies data
        Throws:
        exception.APIRequestException - When the API Request couldn't be fullfilled

      • rtPerson

                             throws exception.APIRequestException
        Scrapes RT at path and returns info about that person
        Parameters:
        rtPath - : The path on rotten tomatoes to scrape
        Returns:

      • imdbInfo

        public store.api.ImdbMovieDTO imdbInfo​(java.lang.String name)
                                throws exception.APIRequestException
        Scrapes IMDB and looks for the movie with that name
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the movie
        Returns:
        Return a JSONObject containing information about that Movie

        exception.APIRequestException - When the API Request couldn't be fullfilled
